title: Better placed than peers to fight inflation: Finance ministry report - Business Standard
content:
1. Better placed than peers to fight inflation: Finance ministry report  Business Standard
  2. Inflation hurt rich more than poor in FY22, says Finance Ministry  Moneycontrol
  3. Steps by RBI, govt to cut duration of elevated inflation: Finance ministry  The Financial Express
  4. GDP growth to be near 8%, despite inflation worries: Finance Ministry  The Hindu
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The report said that seen over a longer time horizon, inflation in India's economy has not been as much a challenge as is sensed from month-to-month changes
